entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Harry's Firebolt is a significant object in his life. It is mentioned that he returns to look at it almost every day.

entities.name: apothecary
entities.description: The Apothecary is a store where Harry buys potions ingredients. It is described as a place where he needs to replenish his stock.

entities.name: madam malkin's robes for all occasions
entities.description: Madam Malkin's Robes for All Occasions is a clothing store where Harry buys new school robes. It is mentioned that his old robes are now too short.

entities.name: care of magical creatures
entities.description: Care of Magical Creatures is one of Harry's new subjects at school. He needs to buy books for this subject.

entities.name: divination
entities.description: Divination is another one of Harry's new subjects at school. He also needs to buy books for this subject.

entities.name: the monster book of monsters
entities.description: The Monster Book of Monsters is a book that is being displayed in the window of the bookshop. It is mentioned that there are about a hundred copies of it, and they are grappled with each other.

relationships.description: Harry owns the Firebolt. It is mentioned that he returns to look at it almost every day.
Harry is a customer of the Apothecary. He goes there to buy potions ingredients.

relationships.entity_2: madam malkin's robes for all occasions
relationships.description: Harry is also a customer of Madam Malkin's Robes for All Occasions. He buys new school robes from there.
Harry is a student studying Care of Magical Creatures at school. He needs to buy books for this subject.
Similarly, Harry is also a student studying Divination at school. He needs to buy books for this subject as well.
The Monster Book of Monsters is being displayed in the window of the bookshop.
